title: A Sheep Named Breakfast
features: Breakfast is a cute and colorful character, a cheeky sheep who loves to do lots of fun and active things. But Breakfast is a little bit fussy. Yes, Breakfast only likes to do things that start with the letter B. Join Breakfast as she imagines lots and lots of “B” activities to try to decide which one she wants to do all day.A great book to encourage literacy development skills, being rich in rhyme, rhythm, and alliteration, and by facilitating letter sound connections and opportunities for prediction.
description: Adrienne was born and raised in the beautiful Bay of Plenty, New Zealand, and is now based in Perth, Western Australia. She loves to create colourful, fun and humorous books for families to share and learn with. Adrienne has studied Early Childhood Education, Learning Development, and Human Development... among a few other things.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/oc7d2sml184cu0n9ec84a5llhh._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Adrienne Body', 'about': ['Adrienne loves to create colourful, fun and humorous books for families to share and learn with. She was born and raised in the beautiful Bay of Plenty in New Zealand, and is now happily based in Perth, Western Australia.', 'She studied Art History and Classical Studies at Victoria University in Wellington and Early Childhood Education, Language and Literacy, Learning Development, and Human Development, through Massey University.', '"For as long as I can remember I have loved writing stories and poems. Throughout my school life I filled all my margins with sketches and doodles, I did cute drawings and wrote silly stories and poems for my friends, always handed in three stories when the teacher asked for one, and in my final year I was awarded a scholarship for creative writing.', 'For some reason it took me a long time to come back to my roots as it were, to take the things I had learned and use them to do the things I love... putting them together with writing stories and creating images to make children\'s picture books. But I\'m here now, and loving it."', 'adriennebody.com', 'facebook and instagram: @adriennebodybooks']}
